description: Keeping it light in both style and substance, the Shade Lite™ Short Sleeve Shirt has performance and protection in spades without forgetting to have a good time out there. This breathable, quick-drying shirt features UPF 50 fabric with fresh, modern prints, making it ideal for mornings on the water, days on the trail, and warm nights in camp.
name: Mountain Hardwear Shade Lite SS - Mens

specs.value: PSW Tech Trail Stretch Solid - 100% Polyester
